column4: Going back to Fedora if it supports my wireless card, bye everyone
Fedora's support isn't that different. what's the output of: lshw -C network
my wireless card is a realtek 8172
please the output of the command i gave you
booting my Fedora live flash drive
it should print the status of your card driver and some more info, but you should run it from ubuntu not from fedora
did you run it from ubuntu?
I don't believe my wireless card is supported by Fedora
paste the output of lshw -C network to paste.ubuntu.com
both wired and wireless seem to be fine, check: iwlist scan
doing what? you said earlier you had a wireless problem
